name: Geo Continent App
description: Routes DNS queries based on client's continent using MaxMind GeoIP2.

fields.name: note
fields.label: Note
fields.default: This app requires MaxMind GeoIP2 database files. Configuration is typically done through the Technitium DNS Server web interface.
fields.help: Geo Continent App requires MaxMind GeoIP2 database files and is typically configured through the Technitium DNS Server web interface.
